event_text: The cops have found your hideout, and are banging at your door! Think quick what are you going to do?

event_text: The location of your drug lab has been discovered and it has been raided.
You have been tipped off by one of the Pied Piper admins: you're house is about to get searched! Time is of the essence.

You have finally caved after years of peer pressure and particate in the local annual Beauty Pagent. After various rounds of parading in gliterry swimwear, shaking your ass while dancing the bachata and answering questions using generic terms you have convinced the Jury that you are indeed the one. You win 500 dollars and a year long supply of Yogi Tea.
You're getting older, which besides another day closer to dying also means that you get lots of presents. Here are 100 dollars from your grandma.

event_title: Last night you got drunk and
event_text: Now you have a Tweety Bird tattoo in a private place. That's gonna cost you 150 bucks for choosing bad friends.
